txt.en: Corsair footmen can be found patrolling roads around eastern Belfalas as they search for supply carts to ambush.\n\nDefeat corsairs in Belfalas.
You have defeated many corsair footmen in Belfalas. The roads by the River Ringl√≥ will now be safer for travel.
You have defeated many corsair footmen in Belfalas.
You have defeated many corsair footmen in Belfalas and have helped make the roads safe for the people of Tadrent.
Haelam wants those roads safe again. He has asked you to patrol Belfalas and defeat corsairs.

'We need the roads open and safe for travel. My livelihood depends upon it.

'[placeholder], you should go out there and run the corsairs off the road. Send them cowering back to their captain! Ha!

'At the very least, teach them a lesson for taking a fellow merchant and friend to an early grave.'
